events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position, and our team will be reviewing it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department specifically for the software engineer role.
A recruiter from our engineering hiring team has been assigned to manage your application and will be in touch soon.
The initial screening interview was successfully completed, discussing your software development experience and project background.
The technical interview with our senior engineers has been scheduled for next week to assess your technical skills in-depth.
You have successfully completed the technical interview, showcasing strong software engineering knowledge and problem-solving skills.
Your HR interview has been scheduled to discuss company culture, benefits, and other employment details.
The HR interview was completed positively, and you expressed great alignment with our company values and team.
We have extended a formal offer for the software engineer position including salary and benefits details.
The candidate has provided positive feedback and asked some clarifying questions about the offer package.
The candidate accepted our offer enthusiastically and is excited to join the engineering team.
Onboarding activities have commenced with candidate completing paperwork and initial training setup for the engineering role.
The hiring process is officially closed with the candidate successfully onboarded as a software engineer on the team.
